item.title: 各平台syscall序号
item.description: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty. — Cicero Linux System Calls quick and easy，美化很不错 可搜索的syscall表，但目前只支持x86_64 Chromium OS Docs - Linux System Call Table，和Linux大致一

item.title: 【syscall】get_started_3dsctf_2016
item.description: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves. — Buddha 原题链接 在做题前，我先为其建立了一个专门的工作目录： 【syscall】【Write-up】BUUC
